sources.name: Gini Index – World Bank
sources.description:
Data published by World Bank WDI
Data publisher's source World Bank, Development Research Group. Data are based on primary household survey data obtained from government statistical agencies and World Bank country departments.
Link http://data.worldbank.org/indicator/SI.POV.GINI
Retrieved 2016-10-27

For more information and methodology, please see PovcalNet ( iresearch.worldbank.org/PovcalNet/index.htm ).

It is important to note that the estimates presented here are a mix between income and consumption measures and comparability is therefore limited.
